_header: These are the sins of the mouth
Subjects: tongue, destructive power of; tongue, advice concerning use of
_description: The sins of the mouth, in the Speculum Cristiani — including eight phrases rhyming ‘ing’

Ushaw28.Transcription:
Thies are þe synnes of the mouþeouterage & vuleful
                    tastyngetyng or drinkyngeidul ianglyngwordes of harlatry
                    spekynggoddes body by name in vayne takynglesynge makyngprowte
                    & presumptuose spekyngnyse & ioly thumtyngor to syng more for
                    praysing of men more þan of god
